Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ExtradataExtractor::ExtradataExtractor (  const char *  database,
const char *  host,
const char *  username,
const char *  password
) 
 

Create a new ExtradataExtractor that will connect to the database that is specified as parameters.

The constructor will make the necessary connections to the database, these are used by extractExtradata and extractLatestExtradata for extracting extradatarecords within given criterias and print them to output.

Parameters:
database The name of the database to use.
host The host where to connect to MySQL.
username Username when connecting to the database.
password Password when connection to the database.

virtual ExtradataExtractor::~ExtradataExtractor (   )  [virtual]
 

Delete the ExtradataExtractor and close the connections to the database.
